person.persName: Meredith C. Hughes, Sr. (Jackson County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Jackson County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. South Carolina native. Married to Elizabeth Highes. Father of Clarissa Hughes, Meredith C. Hughes, Jr., James F. Hughes, William P. Hughes, Meredith J. Hughes, Francis K. Hughes, Nancy E. Hughes, and Martha A. Hughes. Surveyor in Owsley County in 1850. Farmer in Jackson County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Jackson County in 1865.
